programme.title: Commitment Asli

programme.title: Murder in Kermadec

programme.desc: Taking on Ratcatcher’s army of beasts turns out to be a piece of cake for the Suicide Squad.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Murder in Kermadec
programme.desc: A man is found dead at the foot of a cliff in a small quiet fishing village. Captain Breguet who wanted to leave the region will have to stay a little longer to solve this crime. She will find a mysterious man on her way and fight to protect her daughter.

programme.title: Particles
programme.desc: As winter sets in and P.A. sees the world shifting around him, he starts to observe strange phenomena in the environment. The changes are imperceptible at first, but gradually his whole world seems to be on the brink.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: Not My Type
programme.desc: A dashing philosopher is sent off to teach in a quiet northern town, where he soon falls for a bubbly and rather vulgar local hairdresser. But will the couple’s carnal affection manage to overcome their irreconcilable differences?

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Last Star Witness - Escape to the Alps
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Masha
programme.desc: Masha has grown up between the boxing ring and the streets of her provincial Russian town. Her closest friends, young gangsters who are loathed by the entire town, love and protect her. And suddenly the cruel truth about them is revealed to her.

programme.title: Paris La Blanche
programme.desc: In this parable of migration, Rekia, 70 years-old, leaves Kabylie for Paris to fetch her husband, Nour, back home. Nour has been sustaining the family from abroad for 40 years. Finding help in new friends, she finds Nour but he is a changed man.

programme.title: Monsoon Baby
programme.desc: After years of failed IVF treatments, Nina and Mark turn to an Indian surrogate. As they anxiously await their baby, the surrogate vanishes, prompting the desperate couple to embark on a frantic search for her and their unborn child.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Joy Of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Goodnight Mommy
programme.desc: In a secluded countryside home, ten-year-old twins grow suspicious when their mother returns from plastic surgery distant and unrecognizable. Isolated from the world, they embark on a quest to find out whether this woman is their mother.
